description:
"...the quality is the best I have seen and the instructor has a really engaging, encouraging and inspiring delivery. It is all very engaging and I am learning well."
- Peter Rudden

Scientific studies have shown that practicing Loving Kindness Meditation gives you very many benefits, e.g.:

  • More positive emotions, like hope, joy and love
  • More positive relations with others
  • More mindfulness
  • Feel more purpose in life
  • Have less illness symptoms
  • Have less self criticism
  • Decreases chronic pain
  • Has an immediate relaxing effect
  • Gives a longer telomere length (has to do with slower aging on cellular level)
  • Becomes a more helpful person
  • Gets an increased social connection
  • Feel more satisfaction with life

-

This course will teach you to do Loving Kindness Meditation in a way that is easy to learn and give you quick results.

The course consists of three different parts:

  1. Benefits of Loving Kindness Meditation. Scientific research has shown that Loving Kindness Meditation gives you a lot of benefits, here the most up-to-date research will be presented.
  2. How to practive Loving Kindness Meditation. You will be shown how to practice Loving Kindness in a way that is easy to learn and lead to quick results.
  3. Actual Loving Kindness Meditation. To help you learn Loving Kindness quickly, three different guided meditations are provided. These meditations can be downloaded to your phone or computer in mp3 format.
title: Loving-Kindness Meditation : How to Create Inner Peace
